title: Lightbox Modal

description.content: The Lightbox Modal displays a full of data such as documents, images or a movie inside a Lightbox.
If multiple pages or images are to be displayed in one Lightbox Modal, they can flipped through.
Lightbox Modals are activated by clicking the Full View Glyphicon, the Title of the object or itâ€™s Thumbnail.
Preview Popovers have some relation to Lightbox Modals. Preview Popovers only display parts or a reduced level of detail of the data to be previewed while Lightbox Modals display a complete view.

context: Mediacast Objects are presented inside a Lightbox Modals.
rules: Lightbox Modals MUST contain a Closing Button on the top right and a title above the presented item.
Lightobx Modals MUST contain a title above the presented item.
Lightbox Modals SHOULD contain a descriptional text below the presented items.
Multiple images or pages inside a Lightbox Modals MUST be presented in carousel like manner allowing to flickr through items.
